title: Reality - Digital Wellbeing App
description: A privacy-first Android app to block distracting apps and websites. 100% offline, zero data collection, open source.

sections.title: Technical Stack
sections.content:
### Built With
- **Language**: Kotlin
- **Architecture**: MVVM with Android Architecture Components
- **Database**: Room (local storage only)
- **UI**: Material Design 3 with custom dark theme
- **Background Processing**: WorkManager
- **Accessibility**: Custom Accessibility Service for app detection

### Requirements
- Android 8.0 (API 26) or higher
- No internet connection required
